name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Highly skilled in **Technical Sales** and **Consultative Selling**, I bring 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, equipped with a robust understanding of customer needs and a proven ability to drive **Business Development** and refine **Customer Relationship Management**. My background in full-stack development using modern **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** enhances my technical acumen, allowing me to articulate complex solutions clearly and effectively to stakeholders. 

I excel in **Key Account Management**, employing strategic networking and problem-solving abilities to foster and maintain strong client partnerships. I have a strong foundation in **cloud services** like **Azure** and **AWS**, and I understand the impact of technology on business success. This technical expertise complements my sales capabilities, ensuring I can effectively convey the value of innovative solutions. I am fluent in both English and Swedish, enabling me to communicate effectively with a diverse customer base. My experience includes navigating budgets and aligning solutions with compliance standards, demonstrating a comprehensive ability to meet client objectives while driving impactful outcomes.
